nodes.text: The Jedi Temple training ground was an area of the Jedi Temple exterior, near the base of the Temple's central spire, where grows an ancient gnarled tree with golden boughs.
During the Clone Wars, at around 20 BBY, a duel between Anakin Skywalker and Barriss Offee interrupted a training session of Jedi younglings conducted by Tera Sinube at the training ground.
